thread.title: Rani Padmini's second song endorses Chandigarh
thread.title_full: Rani Padmini's second song endorses Chandigarh - The Times of India

author: Anjana George
title: Rani Padmini's second song endorses Chandigarh
text:
Aashiq Abu's upcoming Malayalam movie, 'Rani Padmini' starring Manju Warrier, Rima Kallingal,Jinu Joseph,Sreenath Bhasi and Kunjan has a beautiful song sung by Chitra Arun.
The song, Oru Makara Nilavaay... is written by Rafeeq Ahammed and composed By Bijibal. With amazing visual featuring Manju Warrier and Jinu Joseph is shot at the backdrop of Chandigarh
